messages.content: Hi! I just got a new job at Google as a machine learning engineer.
Congratulations! That's wonderful news. What team will you be on?
I'm on the recommendation systems team. I also adopted a cat named Luna last weekend!
Great team choice! And Luna is a lovely name. What does she look like?
Luna is black with white paws. She's very playful! I've also started learning to bake sourdough bread.
She sounds adorable! Sourdough is a great hobby. How's the baking going?

questions.question: What is my cat's name and what does she look like?
questions.answer: Luna, she is black with white paws

questions.question: How long after starting my job did I adopt my cat?
questions.answer: About one week (adopted around March 16, started job March 15)

messages.content: I'm planning a trip to Japan next month with my friend Sarah. We want to visit Tokyo and Kyoto.
How exciting! Japan is beautiful. How long will you be there?
We'll be there for 10 days. Sarah is really into photography so we're focusing on scenic spots. I booked a ryokan in Kyoto!
10 days is perfect! A ryokan experience will be memorable. Which one did you book?

questions.question: Who am I traveling to Japan with?
Which cities will I visit in Japan?
How long is my Japan trip?
What type of accommodation did I book in Kyoto?
